campaignId.description: The campaign ID plus the start date (day) for this record.

campaignName.description: The (current) campaign name for this record.

clicks.description: Total PromotedLinks clicks across the entire query range.

conversionRate.description: The average rate of conversions per click percentage across the entire query range. Calculated as: (conversions / clicks)/100

conversions.description: The total number of conversions calculated across the entire query range.

cpa.description: The average CPA (Cost Per Acquisition) calculated across the entire query range. Calculated as: (spend / conversions)

ctr.description: The average CTR (Click Through Rate) percentage across the entire query range (clicks / impressions)/100.

ecpc.description: The effective (calculated) average CPC (Cost Per Click) across the entire query range. Calculated as: (spend / clicks)

fromDate.description: The start date for this record.

impressions.description: Total number of PromotedLinks impressions across the entire query range.

spend.description: The total amount of money spent across the entire query range.
